description: Defines a data transfer object (DTO) class 'NoteUpdateRequest' used for updating note entities, including validation annotations for 'title' and 'content' fields.

classes.name: NoteUpdateRequest
classes.description: DTO class representing the payload for updating a note, encapsulating 'title' and 'content' with validation constraints.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the note.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the note.
